Class Order

java.lang.Object
  Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<OrderItem>
public class Order
extends Object
implements Iterable<OrderItem>

This class models a list of ordered items. It contains a collection of OrderItem objects.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
OrderItem

getItem

public OrderItem getItem(Product product)
Returns the OrderItem object with the specified product.
